HPI 8002 Nissan Skyline GT-R 1992 JTC Series 6th/5th Place T. Kinoshita/A. Olofsson

Manufacturer page: http://www.hpimodelcar.com/line_up/index_8002.php

Anders Olofsson drove for the successful Hasemi Motorsport team with Masahiro Hasemi, winning the JTC championship in 1989 and 1991. In 1992 he moved to the Nismo team with JTC rookie Takayuki Kinoshita. Kinoshita & Olofsson won 2 rounds that season and finished in 5th (Olofsson) & 6th (Kinoshita) places. These would be the last wins for Olofsson in the JTC.
